doctor.name: Prof. Dr. ASM Lokman Hossain Chowdhury
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. ASM Lokman Hossain Chowdhury is a Pediatric Surgeon in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery). He is a Professor & Head, Pediatric Surgery at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Delta Health Care, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. ASM Lokman Hossain Chowdhury at Delta Health Care, Mymensingh is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Nadiuzzaman Khan Nadim
doctor.info: Dr. Nadiuzzaman Khan Nadim is a Pediatric Surgeon in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Pediatric Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Pediatric Surgery at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Nadiuzzaman Khan Nadim at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 2pm to 5pm (Sat, Sun & Wed).
